name: Thunderlord
description: Each enemy you hit with Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 3 sec.

name: The Wall
description: Shield Slam generates an additional 2 Rage and reduces the remaining cooldown of Shield Wall by 4 sec.

name: Misshapen Mirror
description: Spell Reflection lasts 200% longer, and applies to your party.

name: Signet of Tormented Kings
description:
Activating  

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>Ravager</dynamic>

Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

name: Battlelord
description: Your Slam has a 30% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike.

name: Unhinged
description:
While 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>Ravager</dynamic>

Bladestorm is active, you automatically cast a total of 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>1</dynamic>

2 Mortal Strikes at random nearby enemies.

name: Exploiter
description: Execute causes the target to take 25% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Enduring Blow
description: Your Mortal Strike has a 15% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 5 sec.

name: Cadence of Fujieda
description: Bloodthirst increases your Haste by2% for 5 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

name: Deathmaker
description: Your Rampage has a 25% chance to apply the Siegebreaker effect to your target for 5 sec.

name: Reckless Defense
description: Rampage critical strikes reduce your Recklessness and Enraged Regeneration cooldown by 3 sec.

name: Unbreakable Will
description: Your Shield Wall ability now grants 50% of its effect to all party members.

name: Reprisal
description: The first Intercepted attack granst you Ignore Pain and make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

name: Seismic Reverberation
description:
If Whirlwind 

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>or Revenge</dynamic>

hits 3 or more enemies, it hits them 1 additional time.
